Alice Mamaga Akosua Amoako bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ nke Ghana na onye guzobere AUTISM AMBASSADORS OF GHANA.Sha bụ otu n'ime ndị mepụtara ngwa Autism Aid.

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, nne Amoako gbara ya ume isonye na mmemme redio ndị ntorobịa aha ya bụ 'CURIOUS MINDS' iji kwalite ihe ọmụma ya ma tụleba itinye aka na ọrụ mmepe n'obodo ya.Mgbe e mesịrị, Amoako gara Ghana Telecom University College wee nata Bachelor of Information Technology na 2015.

N'afọ 2014, Amoako guzobere Autism Ambassadors of Ghana, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ịmara banyere ịrịa ọrịa autism nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwado ụmụaka nwere nsogbu autism. Ihe omume a na-ejikọta ndị ọkachamara na ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo iji kwalite mmata nke autism yana imeziwanye ndụ ndị autistic site na teknụzụ.
Dị ka akụkụ nke Autism Ambassadors nke Ghana, Amoako na Solomon Avemegah jikọtara aka mepụta ngwa gam akporo Autism Aid
Ngwa ahụ bụ nke mbụ n'ụdị ya maka ụmụaka autistic bi na Ghana na West Africa. Ọ na-enye nkwurịta okwu ọzọ na nke na-abawanye maka ụmụaka ma na-enye ihe enyemaka ahụike dị mkpa.

Amoako bụkwa onye so na kọmitii mba nke Mgbakọ Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu Maka ikike nke ndị nwere nkwarụ.Na 2016, ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu panel na World Youth Summit of Girl Guides Ọ nọchikwara anya Ghana na Global Social Hackathon na Swed.
